backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no defined methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented audit logging and related app features with associated files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files describing their roles in the application.
frontend/.env.example: Example environment variable file showing required Firebase configuration keys.
frontend/ANDROID_RELEASE.md: Guide explaining prerequisites and steps to build an Android release APK using Capacitor.
frontend/android/keystore.properties.exa: Example Android keystore configuration file demonstrating required fields for release signing.
frontend/android/keystores/README.md: Instructions and security warnings for managing Android signing keystores without committing them to version control.
frontend/build-outputs/.gitkeep: Empty placeholder file ensuring the build-outputs directory is tracked.
frontend/FIREBASE_SETUP.md: Setup guide explaining how to configure Firebase and install required tools for cloud sync.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS base and theme variables defining the app’s color system and dark mode styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file that loads the React application root and main entry script.
frontend/README.md: Project overview and quick start instructions for the Phoenix Boutique offline-first order management app.
frontend/scripts/build-android-release-a: Shell script that builds the web assets, syncs Capacitor, compiles a release APK, and copies it to build-outputs.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that initializes the offline DB, sets up providers, and loads the main app shell.
Invisible component that triggers automatic order sync logic through a custom hook.
frontend/src/firebase/auditLogs.ts: Best-effort Firestore audit logging service providing functions to write and read audit log entries without breaking offline behavior.
frontend/src/firebase/auth.ts: Provides email signup, signin, and signout helpers using dynamically imported Firebase Auth with clear errors when unavailable.
frontend/src/firebase/firebaseApp.ts: Initializes Firebase services via dynamic imports only when config exists, exposing getters for app, auth, firestore, and storage.
frontend/src/firebase/firebaseConfig.ts: Loads Firebase config from environment variables and returns a typed config object with an isConfigured flag.
frontend/src/firebase/FirebaseProvider.t: React provider that exposes Firebase configuration state and initialized Auth, Firestore, and Storage instances.
frontend/src/firebase/firestoreOrders.ts: Uploads or updates order documents in Firestore using dynamic imports, sending only defined fields for idempotent writes.
frontend/src/firebase/storageImages.ts: Handles Firebase Storage image upload and deletion using dynamic imports, generating deterministic per-user paths.
frontend/src/firebase/useFirebaseAuth.ts: React hook that tracks Firebase auth state with a dynamically imported listener and exposes user and loading flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrdersAutoSync.ts: Automatically triggers order sync based on connectivity, Firebase availability, authentication, and role, with throttling and state guards.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrdersLiveQuery.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching all, recent, or single orders and auto‑refreshing on local DB change events.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, dark mode, and print‑specific styling.
frontend/src/layout/AppShell.tsx: Renders the main app layout, routing screens based on navigation state and enforcing role‑based access checks.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/navigation/BottomNav.tsx: Implements the bottom navigation bar with buttons for dashboard, new order, and orders list.
frontend/src/navigation/NavigationProvid: Provides navigation context storing the current screen and optional state, with a navigateTo helper.
frontend/src/rbac/RoleProvider.tsx: Manages user role with localStorage persistence and exposes derived permissions.
frontend/src/rbac/roleTypes.ts: Defines role and permissions types and returns permission sets for ADMIN or STAFF.
frontend/src/rbac/useRole.ts: Hook for accessing role and permissions from RoleProvider.
frontend/src/screens/AuditAccountsScreen: Admin‑only audit screen that filters orders by time range and computes financial metrics for display.
frontend/src/screens/AuditLogsScreen.tsx: ADMIN-only screen that loads recent Firestore audit logs with handling for access, configuration, auth, loading, and error states.
frontend/src/screens/DashboardScreen.tsx: Displays order metrics and recent orders with UI tiles and navigation, using live queries and computed dashboard metrics.
frontend/src/screens/EditOrderScreen.tsx: Loads an existing order, pre-fills a form, validates and updates it, and writes audit logs on changes.
frontend/src/screens/NewOrderScreen.tsx: Form for creating a new order with validation, pricing calculations, and audit log write on submission.
Shows detailed order info with edit/delete actions, payment dialog, and audit logging on delete.
frontend/src/screens/OrdersListScreen.ts: Lists all orders with status, delivery date, and optional financials, allowing navigation to order details.
frontend/src/screens/PrintableAuditSumma: Renders an admin‑only printable audit summary showing weekly and monthly metrics and detailed order lists with print support.
frontend/src/screens/PrintableSummaryScr: Displays an admin‑only printable summary of today’s and this week’s orders with status badges and print functionality.
frontend/src/screens/ReportsScreen.tsx: Provides the main reports dashboard with CSV export, printable report navigation, Firebase auth UI, sync controls, and admin‑only sections.
frontend/src/screens/StaffManagementScre: Shows an admin‑only staff management placeholder screen gated by Firebase configuration and authentication.
frontend/src/screens/UpdatePaymentDialog: Dialog for updating an order’s payment details, validating inputs, updating history, and writing audit logs.
Contains pure utilities for filtering orders by date ranges and computing audit metrics such as revenue and outstanding amounts.
frontend/src/services/currencyFormat.ts: Provides INR currency formatting helpers with safe handling for invalid values.
frontend/src/services/localDb.ts: Initializes and migrates an IndexedDB store for orders, adding pricing, payment, and sync metadata fields across versions.
frontend/src/services/offlineInit.ts: Bootstraps offline mode by initializing IndexedDB with error handling.
frontend/src/services/orderCsvExport.ts: Generates CSV strings for orders and audit exports and provides browser download utilities.
frontend/src/services/orderImagesLocal.t: Provides local-only image storage utilities, including data URL conversion and ID generation.
frontend/src/services/orderQueries.ts: Computes dashboard metrics and date-based filters for orders using local-timezone logic.
frontend/src/services/ordersRepository.t: Typed IndexedDB repository for orders with normalization of pricing, payment, and sync-tracking fields.
Synchronizes local orders and images with Firebase using role-based sanitization and per-order isolation.
frontend/src/services/paymentCalculation: Calculates balance, derives payment status, and validates pricing fields for order forms.
frontend/src/services/syncStatusStore.ts: Manages sync status in localStorage, providing getters and helpers for success and error updates.
frontend/src/shared/hooks/useOnlineStatu: React hook that tracks and returns the browser’s online/offline state via window events.
frontend/src/shared/ui/AccessDeniedScree: UI screen showing an access-denied message with a button to return to the dashboard.
frontend/src/shared/ui/notify.ts: Console-based success/error notification helper for offline-friendly feedback.
frontend/src/shared/ui/RestrictedInlineM: Inline alert component displaying an ADMIN-access-required message.
frontend/src/shared/ui/ScreenTitle.tsx: Simple component rendering a styled screen title heading.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Describes project scope, architecture, features, and known issues for the Phoenix Boutique app.
